<head>
    <div class="osc-init-header">

        <!-- Title -->

        <div class="osc-init-about">

            <!-- Text block -->
            <div class="osc-init-about__text">
                <p>
                    Founded in December 2019, the interdisciplinary journal club "ReproducibiliTea" takes place regularly 
                    to explore main questions and current topics concerning Open Science and the credibility of research findings. 
                    This concept, which originated in Great Britain, has gained widespread recognition and adoption in numerous 
                    countries under the same name.
                </p>

                <h4 class="osc-init-activities__title">What we do?</h4>
                <ul class="osc-init-activities__list">
                    <li>Open discussions on open science, reproducibility, and related topics</li>
                    <li>Foster exchange of diverse ideas across participants from all academic levels, fields, and institutions</li>
                    <li>In-person meetings, and everyone is encouraged to bring their own snacks and drinks</li>
                </ul>

                <p>
                    As an example of our previous activities, please see:
                    ReproducibiliTea München – Sommersemester 2024
                    <a href="https://www.osc.uni-muenchen.de/meetups/reproducibilitea/reprot_programm_sose2024.pdf" 
                       target="_blank" class="osc-init-about__link">
                        <i class="bi bi-filetype-pdf"></i>
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const list = document.querySelector(".osc-init-organizer-list");
  const items = Array.from(list.querySelectorAll("li"));

  items.sort((a, b) => {
    const endA = parseInt(a.dataset.end, 10);
    const endB = parseInt(b.dataset.end, 10);

    // Active members first (those ending in 2024)
    if (endA === 2024 && endB !== 2024) return -1;
    if (endB === 2024 && endA !== 2024) return 1;

    // Within active group, sort by start year (earliest first)
    if (endA === 2024 && endB === 2024) {
      return parseInt(a.dataset.start, 10) - parseInt(b.dataset.start, 10);
    }

    // For past members, sort by end year (most recent first)
    return endB - endA;
  });

  // Rebuild list
  list.innerHTML = "";
  items.forEach(item => list.appendChild(item));
});
</script>
